description: Detects the creation of files with an executable or script extension by an Office application.
author: Vadim Khrykov (ThreatIntel)
Cyb3rEng (Rule)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: File With Uncommon Extension Created By An Office Application
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\excel.exe" OR "*\\msaccess.exe" OR "*\\mspub.exe" OR "*\\powerpnt.exe" OR "*\\visio.exe" OR "*\\winword.exe") AND file.path.text:("*.bat" OR "*.cmd" OR "*.com" OR "*.dll" OR "*.exe" OR "*.hta" OR "*.ocx" OR "*.proj" OR "*.ps1" OR "*.scf" OR "*.scr" OR "*.sys" OR "*.vbe" OR "*.vbs" OR "*.wsf" OR "*.wsh")) AND (NOT (file.path.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\assembly\\tmp\\*" AND file.path.text:"*.dll"))) AND (NOT (((file.path.text:"*C\:\\Users\\*" AND file.path.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\Office\\*" AND file.path.text:"*\\WebServiceCache\\AllUsers*" AND file.path.text:"*.com")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\winword.exe" AND file.path.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\webexdelta\\*" AND file.path.text:("*.dll" OR "*.exe"))))))
